title: [Abbey Guest House, Solar]
[Abbey, Waiting Chamber]
description: Angled off of the main hall, this room is semiprivate.  Remains of stout wooden furnishings imply a certain level of comfort afforded the guests of the Merciful Sisters.

Angled off from the main hall, the chamber is semiprivate.  A stout honey maple sideboard lines one wall, sitting opposite a few comfortable chairs of arctic puma hide leather.  The far wall features a large stained glass window that looks out onto tree-lined mountains crowned in snow.
